sense.name: start suddenly, as if from fright
sense.examples: The first time I let the mustang smell the rope, she shied at it. He shied back from her touch. Once, coming around a bend, he shied abruptly, like a startled horse.

sense.name: throw quickly, flick
sense.examples: The second baseman shied the ball over to the first base.

sense.name: SHY AWAY FROM: avoid
sense.examples: Ferber shied away from writing about the outsiders she knew best. He shied away from society. Their reputation is tarnished and people will shy away from their products.
